value.title: What AI forgets could kill us, but new research is helping it remember
value.excerpt: A better understanding how the human brain makes memories could help us to reduce neural networks' habit of 'catastrophic' forgetting.

value.title: Microsoft’s ‘top choice’: supply of Nvidia AI GPUs improved but still tight
value.excerpt: He mentioned that the situation regarding GPU supply has improved compared to a few months back, although it is still tight. Previously, the demand for Nvidia’s GPUs for AI and HPC applications exceeded the supply capacity of the entire ecosystem.

value.title: NVIDIA's EU Trouble: European Commission starts investigating GPU-maker’s dominance in AI chips

value.title: My way or the AI way: Companies approach govt for infra amid GPU scarcity
value.excerpt: GPUs are the highways AI requires. Companies are therefore petitioning the Centre to invest in the vital compute infrastructure so that local startups can compete and win meaningfully in the frenetic global AI race.

value.title: EU examines Nvidia-dominated AI chip market's alleged abuses, Bloomberg reports
value.excerpt: The European Union is examining alleged anticompetitive practices in chips used for artificial intelligence, a market that Nvidia dominates, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.

value.title: AMD CEO Lisa Su on the AI revolution and competing with Nvidia
value.excerpt: At this year’s Code Conference, AMD CEO Lisa Su revealed how the company is using AI in chip design, the future outlook of the GPU business and chip supply chain, and how AMD plans to compete with Nvidia’s H100.

value.title: EU examines Nvidia-dominated AI chip market's abuses, Bloomberg reports
value.excerpt: The European Union is examining alleged anticompetitive practices in chips used for artificial intelligence, a market that Nvidia dominates, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.

value.title: Supermicro At 30: From Designing AI Chips To Selling AI Systems

value.title: AI chip crunch: Startups vie for Nvidia's vital component
value.excerpt: The artificial intelligence revolution is fully underway, but soaring demand for its most crucial component has startups scratching their heads on how they can deliver on AI's promise.

value.title: Tencent-backed AI chip startup Enflame raises $274 million from state-linked investors, others
value.excerpt: The deal came as the development of generative AI, boosted by the success of OpenAI's ChatGPT, raises investor interest in companies working on AI-related infrastructure such as AI chips. Enflame said the latest fundraising was co-led by investors including a few funds backed by Shanghai International Group,

value.title: Chip industry strains to meet AI-fueled demands — will smaller LLMs help?
value.excerpt: Large language models are growing in size, as is the number of companies using generative AI technology. The more the models grow, the more CPUs they consume — exacerbating an already-strained chip supply chain.

value.title: Tencent-backed AI chip startup Enflame raises $2.7 billion from state-linked investors, others
value.excerpt: China's artificial intelligence (AI) chip startup Enflame, backed by tech giant Tencent, on Thursday said it raised 20 billion yuan

value.title: Microsoft technology chief says supply of Nvidia's AI chips is improving
value.excerpt: Kevin Scott, Microsoft's chief technology officer, said supply of Nvidia's graphics processing units is improving now that generative AI hype has cooled a bit.

value.title: Exclusive: Meta executive leading AI chip efforts to leave position
value.excerpt: A Meta Platforms executive overseeing the company's efforts to develop its own chips for artificial intelligence work is leaving her position at the end of the month, according to two sources familiar with the matter.

value.title: Prototype Chips Deliver AI Task Solutions With Minimal Power Consumption
value.excerpt: A chip with 35M memory devices and 34 tiles attains 12.4 TOPS/W (tera-operations per second per watt ), showcasing software-equivalent accuracy for keyword spotting and near-equivalent accuracy for large neural networks across five chips.

value.title: AI chip startup Kneron secures $49M investment

value.title: Rebellions' AI chip to undergo IBM quality testing
value.excerpt: Korean AI semiconductor startup Rebellions said Monday that its chips were set to undergo quality testing at data centers of IBM Research's AI Hardware Center in New York. IBM Research's AI Hardware Center conducts exhaustive quality testing for enterprise-grade data center processors.

value.title: The Top Ten Global Fintech Conferences: From AI To Zombie Unicorns
value.excerpt: Providing nuggets of wisdom (and perhaps a side order of entertainment) for the assembly is a blue chip roster of over 350 expert speakers ... will focus heavily on the growth and adoption of AI, and how the technology can be used in financial services.

value.title: Everything Microsoft unveiled at its Surface and AI event this week
value.excerpt: At a private NYC venue, Microsoft launched a duet of Surface laptops and all the AI features. Here's the low-down of everything announced.

value.title: Gelsinger: Intel Is Prioritizing AI Sales Enablement For Partners
value.excerpt: Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger tells CRN that enabling partners to sell AI products is a priority. Intel executives Christoph Schell and John Kalvin detail how Intel is enabling partners.

value.title: GPUs Transformed AI. Now They’re Here For Quantum.
value.excerpt: While quantum hardware remains immature, companies say they found another way to put complex quantum algorithms to work: running them on the same chips used for powering artificial intelligence.

value.title: AI GPU demand remains strong, says AWS
value.excerpt: AI GPU demand remains strong and the chip shortage has yet to have a significant impact on Amazon Web Services (AWS), according to Robert Wang, managing director of AWS in Taiwan and Hong Kong.

value.title: AMD Says AI Not Yet Needed For PCs. Really??
value.excerpt: I love what AMD is doing with their data center GPUs (see my take on the MI300), but someone needs to wake up on the opportunity for the desktop.

value.title: 3 AI Chip Stocks That Should Be on Every Investor’s Radar This Fall
value.excerpt: Nvidia’s (NASDAQ: NVDA) dominance in 2023 on the emergence of its AI chips has investors seeking the next AI chip stock that can provide similar returns. Pretty much every tech firm and every chipmaker is addressing the opportunity in some form or another. This has led to the rise of AI stocks to buy.
